sentences.sContent: Do you ever wonder if you made the right decision?
sentences.sCn: 你怀疑过自己所作的决定是否正确吗？

sentences.sContent: The judges’ decision is final (= it will not be changed ) .
sentences.sCn: 法官的裁决是最终判决。

sentences.sContent: ...The first decision is your choice of course...
...The author thinks her friend made a rational decision in choosing a more hospitable place over an apparently elegant assisted living home...
...A resident’s satisfaction with a care facility has much to do with whether they had participated in the decision to move in and how long they had stayed there...
...What is the first decision you should make in preparing to apply for a place at a university...
...We wanted to give people an opportunity to actually see the calories before they purchased the food and make a decision and inform decision...
...The next decision is where to apply...
...Whether residents felt involved in the decision to move and how long they had lived there also proved significant...
...But in the same breath will remind you that it is the most important decision of your life...
...deciding what to do upon graduation can be a tough decision to say the least...
...Kodak's decision not to pursue the role of official film for the 1984Los Angeles Olympics was a major miscalculation...

words.tran: 决定性的；果断的，坚定的
明确的；显然的；坚决的，果断的

trans.tranOther: a choice or judgment that you make after a period of discussion or thought
